title: pnl
author: pnl
created_time: November 30, 2022, 02:26:12 PMLast edit: November 30, 2022, 03:49:46 PM by pnl
content: I'm selling BTC AND XMR with low minimum. All payments are done via Paypal OR CashappMinimum BTC: $100Minimum XMR: $10Rate 17 - 24.8% above current market priceBTC is bought directly through Crypto.com then withdrawn to your desired wallet/s address. (50K Weekly) XMR is the same process through Binance and KuCoin. I'm fully verified on these crypto exchanges all accounts belong to meThe exchange process is not instant however its usually completed fast within half an hourI'm available most of the day Eastern Standard TimeIf you have any question feel free to contact me on Telegram: @pnl100

comments.author: pnl
comments.body: If you would have read my post you would have seen that I clearly state I purchase the crypto using aggregated exchanges and later send the crypto to clients desired wallet/s. Obviously it would have been better through escrow no doubt. However I clearly state how I do business. I’m honestly trying to do business here and it’s disappointing to see this is my first impression to the community on this site.

comments.author: pnl
comments.body: If you don’t like my service that’s fine but ridiculing me like this is disheartening. I’m trying to provide a honest service. Also you haven’t caught anything I simply deleted my Telegram as I’m not offering this service anymore. It’s the best way of doing it as you can’t delete post on this website unless you contact a moderator and that takes time (currently waiting) and most people prefer escrow. You come off as a real jerk in this situation.

comments.author: pnl
comments.body: my service is as is, you were never scammed and I never had intentions of scamming anyone. You disliked my service and made a big deal about it. Escrow is clearly the best way of exchanging currency , so I deleted my Telegram and requested one of the mods to delete this post as I’m no longer offering this service. Now you think you’re onto something… It’s really not that deep. Sorry for wasting your time, this is my last post.

comments.author: virginorange
comments.body: Quote from: pnl on November 30, 2022, 02:26:12 PMRate 17 - 24.8% above current market priceBTC is bought directly through Crypto.com then withdrawn to your desired wallet/s address. (50K Weekly) XMR is the same process through Binance and KuCoinYou offer "buy BTC on regulated exchange, sell for premium".The standard premium for this service is 4-6% and offered by several sellers on Bisq or Localcrypto.If you lower your fees to 4%, I would buy from you.I'm willing to bear the settlement risk, if you can show you are probably honest.
